title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - the ultimate outdoor accessory for men, boys, teens, and kids! With a choice of 36 or 360 LEDs, this flying disc is 100 times brighter than any other light-up disc on the market. It features 16 million color RGB options, ensuring that your disc will stand out in any setting.

The TOSY Flying Disc is equipped with smart modes that allow you to customize your experience. With brightness level control, timer mode, and motion sensors that automatically light up the disc, you'll have complete control over your game. Plus, the disc is rechargeable, with a charge duration of just 30 minutes and a playtime of up to a thousand throws or a 90-minute match. It comes with a USB Type C to C cable for easy charging.

Weighing in at 175 grams, the TOSY Flying Disc meets professional ultimate standards and is a game-changer for any disc game. Its high durability and waterproof design make it perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes.

Experience long, straight, and precise flights with the TOSY Flying Disc. Its comfortable grip and suitability for tricks make it the perfect outdoor accessory for any occasion. Whether you're camping, playing at the park, or just having fun in your backyard, the TOSY Flying Disc is the perfect gift for anyone who loves outdoor activities. Order yours today and take your game to the next level!
